item.description:
Last minute taste of Winter Ride if you dare. Tomorrow is supposed to be Sunny with lots of Wind and high of 40 ...very brrr.  

Route Summary:
33 mile ride starting in Concord thru Sudbury and Lincoln Returning to the Keyes Parking Area as a midpoint (around 14 miles). This is in case anyone feels the wind and cold is too much which could be everyone ;).

For those committed to getting in a full ride before the season is over,  continue out to Carlisle thru Great Brook State Farm and return to Keyes Parking area.  Main St Cafe at the parking area has warm drinks for after the ride.

The wind and cold means you have to dress right for the ride, i.e. windproof clothing and appropriate coverage (hands, feet, neck) and layers.

The route
http://goo.gl/maps/Itv35

Riders should plan to meet at 10:30 am and be ready to ride around 10:45 am.

We should return to the parking area around 1:30 pm if we can keep the 12 plus pace. Please be able to b/c the group needs to return on time to the parking area.


Starting point and Midway point
8 Keyes Rd Parking Area
Concord MA

What's required
------------------------------------

Layers, thin liner hat which covers ears under helmet, windproof gloves, thick socks for bike shoes, windproof riding gear, and neckwarmer type face cover.

Bike helmets and road bikes / skinny tire hybrids in good repair
1 full water bottles
bring a snack


What's recommended:
------------------------------------
Spare tire, repair kit, sun screen, snacks, energy bars,  an extra layer, and a cell phone.


"Cue"gle sheet

http://files.meetup.com/482869/LincolnConcordCarlisleColdOne.txt
item.name: Concord, Lincoln, and Carlisle Cold One
